ballguy_Pokemon/4001_1001_0300_10:
Hello there! You seem to be searching for
something! I can help you out!
ballguy_Pokemon/4001_1001_0500_10:
If you could search for our Voltorb with us, that’d
be really helpful!
ballguy_Pokemon/4001_1001_0700_10: Yeah. They were helping us with our inventions...
ballguy_Pokemon/4001_1001_0800_10:
But one of them exploded, and that scared the
others, so they ran off!
ballguy_Pokemon/4001_1001_0900_10: There were 10 Voltorb total that ran away...
ballguy_Pokemon/4001_1001_1200_10: Sorry for the trouble. And thank you!
ballguy_Pokemon/4002_1001_0100_10: We couldn’t find all the Voltorb...
ballguy_Pokemon/4002_1001_0200_10:
Let’s take a break for now and come back to
search again later.
ballguy_Pokemon/4002_1001_0300_10: Thanks for the help, Ball Guy!
ballguy_Pokemon/4002_1001_0400_10:
You’re very welcome. We’ll definitely find them
all next time!
ballguy_Pokemon/4003_1001_0300_10:
Just as I heard, you sure are an expert on all
things ball-like!
ballguy_Pokemon/4003_1001_0400_10: Oh my! That makes me feel so honora-ball!
